item.title: Fixing duel glitch
item.dc:creator: @sickamore sickamore
item.description:
@sickamore wrote:

hey someone just showed me a glitch that if you click report abuse you win the stake…how do i fix this? do i add if duel status = 3 return false to it or something? this is the report abuse code :

case 218: String abuser = misc.longToPlayerName(inStream.readQWord()); int rule = inStream.readUnsignedByte(); int mute = inStream.readUnsignedByte(); reportAbuse(abuser, rule, mute); break;
